title: "IAEA Teams up with ITU and UN Family to Promote AI for Good"
excerpt: "The IAEA has joined the International Telecommunication Union (ITU) and 37 other United Nations organizations to work together in identifying artificial intelligence (AI) applications that accelerate reaching the UN Sustainable Development Goals."
